data.actual_result: Video is not saved to your phone's camera roll
data.expected_result: Video should be saved to your phone's camera roll
data.short_description: Recording and uploading a video using Discord doesn't save the video to your camera roll
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the file manager and select "Take a picture or video" - Record a video and send it to a channel - Check your phone's camera roll for the video
